T02D3201:208b-4: sgrol ma srid gsum sgrol mdzad ma //
T02D3201:208b-5: rgya nag chen po'i lugs btud nas //
T02D3201:208b-6: bla ma'i gdams ngag ji bzhin du //
T02D3201:208b-7: de yi sgrub thabs bdag gis bshad //
T02D3201:208b-8: rtags gcig dang ni dur khrod dang //
T02D3201:209a-1: cad du yang khyim stong ste //
T02D3201:209a-2: rnal 'byor pas ni der gnas la //
T02D3201:209a-3: rig pa srid gsum sgrol mdzad sgrub //
T02D3201:209a-4: stan 'jam nang tshangs can gnas pa //
T02D3201:209a-5: stan gzhan 'jam po yin yang rung //
T02D3201:209a-6: legs par gnas la dngos grub ni //
T02D3201:209a-7: mchog tu gyur pa bsgrub par bya ;
T02D3201:209a-8: / skad cig rnam pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D3201:209a-9: mnyam par bzhag pas rdo rje gsum //
T02D3201:209a-10: gnas gsum du ni bsgom byas la //
T02D3201:209a-11: de nas 'od zer rnam par spro //
T02D3201:209a-13: sems can snang byas slar yang ni //
T02D3201:209a-14: legs par bsdu dang yang bsgom pa //
T02D3201:209a-15: mtha' dag stong pa nyid du ste //
T02D3201:209a-16: aom stong pa nyid sogs rang bzhin can //
T02D3201:209a-17: gsang sngags de nas brjod par bya //
T02D3201:209a-18: de nas nam mkhar bsgom bya ba //
T02D3201:209a-19: padmar aa yig las byung ba //
T02D3201:209a-20: yang ni de steng bsgom bya ba //
T02D3201:209a-21: t'a yig las byung pad snod do //
T02D3201:209a-22: yang ni de dbus bsgom bya ba //
T02D3201:209a-23: h'um yig kun nas mthing nag mdog / de nas h'um yig las byung bar //
T02D3201:209a-24: gri gug sa bon gyis brgyan blta //
T02D3201:209a-25: gri gug yongs gyur bdag nyid ni //
T02D3201:209a-26: sgrol ma dang ni mtshungs par bsgom //
T02D3201:209a-27: zhabs g-yas bskum dang 'jigs rung ba'i //
T02D3201:209a-28: mgo bo'i phreng ba legs par 'phyang //
T02D3201:209a-30: autpala sngon pos brgyan pa nyid //
T02D3201:209a-31: lha rdzas zhal gcig spyan gsum ma //
T02D3201:209a-33: legs par rab 'dzum ro bcibs shing //
T02D3201:209a-34: klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D3201:209a-35: stag gi pags pas phod ka dkris //
T02D3201:209a-36: spyan ni dmar dang zlum pa ste //
T02D3201:209a-37: gzhon nu lang tsho la babs ma //
T02D3201:209a-38: phyag rgya lnga yig rnam par brgyan //
T02D3201:209a-40: cung zad tshems gcig sdigs par mdzad //
T02D3201:209a-41: ral gri gri gug phyag g-yas na //
T02D3201:209a-42: g-yon na autpala thod pa bsnams //
T02D3201:209a-43: ser zhing drag pa'i zhal gcig gis //
T02D3201:209a-44: cod pan mi bskyod kyis brgyan bsgom //
T02D3201:209a-45: bsgom pa'i stobs ni rdzogs pa na //
T02D3201:209a-47: rmongs dang gal te lkugs gyur kyang //
T02D3201:209a-48: bsgom pa'i ro la phyed gnyer bas //
T02D3201:209b-0: gsang @209b sngags 'bum phrag bzlas pas kyang //
T02D3201:209b-1: sngags chen 'di ni yi ge gsum //
T02D3201:209b-2: mtha' mar phat do snying la gnas //
T02D3201:209b-3: 'od zer lnga dang kun nas ldan //
T02D3201:209b-4: gti mug bud shing sreg byed yin //
T02D3201:209b-6: de btu ba yi cho ga bshad //
T02D3201:209b-7: dang por sa yi pha rol sbyin ;
T02D3201:209b-8: / dbyangs yig bzhi pas brgyan par bya //
T02D3201:209b-9: yi ge ra ra gnas 'bar 'phro ba'i //
T02D3201:209b-10: zla ba'i thig ler yang dag ldan //
T02D3201:209b-11: de nas yi ge tr'om sbyin te //
T02D3201:209b-12: bzhi pa nyid kyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D3201:209b-13: yi ge au ring legs ldan pa'i //
T02D3201:209b-14: yam ni ham yig sbyar bar bya //
T02D3201:209b-15: de nas phat yig kyang sbyin pa //
T02D3201:209b-16: grub pa'i gsang sngags yongs rdzogs yin //
T02D3201:209b-17: mkhas pas ral gri'i gnas su ni //
T02D3201:209b-18: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D3201:209b-19: bsgom bya mi rus phreng ba yis //
T02D3201:209b-20: sngags kyi mchog ni legs par bzlas //
T02D3201:209b-21: brtan pa'i sems kyis brtag par bya //
T02D3201:209b-22: rgyun du bsgom pa goms pa las //
T02D3201:209b-23: mkhas pa nyid dang snyan dngags par //
T02D3201:209b-25: sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs byas pa las //
T02D3201:209b-26: bdag gis dge ba gang thob pa //
T02D3201:209b-27: des ni 'gro kun ston pa yi //
T02D3201:209b-28: bstan la mkhas pa nyid du shog /'di ni rtag pa'i rdo rjes byas //
T02D3201:209b-29: 'dis ni blo rnon rab grub byed ;
T02D3201:209b-31: bzang po rnams kyis bzod par rigs //
T02D3201:209b-32: rgya nag chen po'i lugs kyi sgrol ma'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
